TopicTitle: Does anyone know a mod that revive the old texture/model of the Rockomax X200 series 2.5m LF tanks?

Articles.Content:
I have seen there are mods such as the "Old Parts Redux" that revives the old parts from KSP 0.73, but I just want the old texture(or a similar silverish-white texture from Restock) for the Rockomax X200 tanks, not all of the parts.

Can anyone tell me if I can do it DIY, or is there any mods that have done it?

Edited July 6, 2020 by RandomKerbal
Welcome to the forum @RandomKerbal, your question has been moved to add on discussions.

You could try creating a procedural tank texture, but it would probably only look authentic for one size due to stretching. I assume it would be easy to model and put in the game of you had experience (which I dont.)

8 hours ago, catloaf said:

You could try creating a procedural tank texture, but it would probably only look authentic for one size due to stretching. I assume it would be easy to model and put in the game of you had experience (which I dont.)

I am not a great fan of procedural parts pack, and I have already tried to modified the textures of the parts.

It is indeed easy in KSP 0.13, but not in 1.10.
